    • Method Detail

      • convertAngle

        public int convertAngle(double angle)
        Converts input angle to the total rotation of each wheel needed to rotate the robot by that angle.
        Parameters:
        angle - the input angle
        Returns:
        the wheel rotations necessary to rotate the robot by the angle

      • convertDistance

        public static int convertDistance(double distance)
        Converts input distance to the total rotation of each wheel needed to cover that distance.
        Parameters:
        distance - the input distance
        Returns:
        the wheel rotations necessary to cover the distance

      • run

        public void run()
        This method directs the robot to travel to each waypoint in the map. It also relocalizes the robot every second waypoint.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • setMap

        public void setMap(Map map)
        This method is a setter for the map global variable.
        Parameters:
        map - the map containing waypoints to travel to.

      • sleepFor

        public static void sleepFor(long millis)
        Sleeps for the specified duration.
        Parameters:
        millis - the duration in milliseconds

      • travelTo

        public void travelTo(int x,
            int y)
        Navigate to a specified location on the board. Should be used post-coordinates localization.
        Parameters:
        x - horizontal coordinates in tile size.
        y - vertical coordinates in tile size.

      • turnTo

        public void turnTo(double absTheta)
        Rotates the robot to the specified heading. Should be used post-heading localization.
        Parameters:
        absTheta - specified heading.
